question: “Coronil” is a medicine developed by which company?
explanation:
Patanjali Ayurved, based at Haridwar, has developed a medicine named Coronil. This medicine has received a certification from Ministry of Ayush, as per World Health Organization (WHO) certification scheme.
The medicine has received “Certificate of Pharmaceutical Product” (CoPP) from the Ayush section of Central Drugs Standard Control Organisation. Now, the medicine can be exported to nearly 150 countries.
